original_text: Then they had to put him outside. But Pharaoh's daughter found him and she took him to her home. She took care of him as if he was her own son.
korean_text: 버려진 후에 바로의 딸이 그를 데려다가 자기 아들로 기르매

sentences.original_text: Then they had to put him outside
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 그를 밖에 내보내야 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and she took him to her home
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그를 자신의 집으로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: as if he was her own son
